price: 11. Who shall inherit the Firdaus (Paradise). They shall dwell therein forever.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yarithūna al-fir'dawsa hum fīhā khālidūna
